questions.question: If a is the width of the slits and b the distance between the slits, then a + b is called as _________

answers.a: nth order spectrum will be absent.
answers.b: n-1 order spectrum will be absent.
answers.c: n-2 order spectrum will be absent.
answers.d: no diffraction pattern will be visible

answers.a: Grating element is the sum of slit width and opaque spacing
answers.b: The distance between two consecutive slits
answers.c: This is element by which grating is made
answers.d: Grating element is a device that we use in experiment for the determination of wavelength.

questions.question: In the diffraction grating experiment, what do the bright spots in the generated pattern represent?

answers.a: plane glass plate on which a large number of opaque rulings are drawn at equidistance with a diamond head.
answers.b: a plano-convex lens producing interference pattern
answers.c: a plane glass plate used for polarizing the light
